revision.comment: [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/APersonBot 8|Bot]] updating 3 categories with sort keys for an article about a battle
revision.text:
{{For|the 18th Century battle of the same name|Battle of Damghan (1729)}} {{Infobox military conflict |conflict=Battle of Damghan |partof=[[Timurid Civil Wars]] |image= |caption= |date=1447 |place=[[Damghan]], [[Semnan Province]], [[Iran]] |result=Tactical [[Timurids]] of [[Samarkand]] Victory
Strategic [[Timurids]] of [[Greater Khorasan|Khurasan]] Victory |combatant1= [[Timurids]] of [[Greater Khorasan|Khurasan]] |combatant2= [[Timurids]] of [[Samarkand]] |commander1=''Unknown Prefect''?
[[Abul-Qasim Babur Mirza]] |commander2=[[Abdal-Latif Mirza]] |campaignbox={{Campaignbox Second Timurid Succession Crisis}} }} When [[Abdal-Latif Mirza]] reached [[Damghan]], the prefect sealed the city and showed his opposition. After a skirmish and siege, the prince took the city by force and gave it over to general plunder. From [[Damghan]], Abdal-Latif Mirza went to [[Bistam]]. At this city he learned of the progress made by [[Abul-Qasim Babur Mirza]] who had taken [[Golestan Province|Jurjan]] and [[Mazandaran Province|Mazandaran]] and thereby cut-off [[Abdal-Latif Mirza]]'s path north to [[Samarkand]]. [[Abdul-Latif Mirza]] now had no choice but to move east arriving at [[Nishapur]] where he learned that [[Ala-ud-Daulah Mirza bin Baysonqor|Ala-ud-Daulah Mirza]] had taken [[Mashad]]. He was now completely encircled, he had nowhere to go. Finally he was attacked at [[Nishapur]] on 20 April 1447 by [[Ala-ud-Daulah Mirza bin Baysonqor|Ala-ud-Daulah Mirza]]'s army and defeated. [[Category:Battles involving the Timurid Empire|Damghan 1447]] [[Category:Conflicts in 1447|Damghan 1447]] [[Category:1447 in Asia]] [[Category:Timurid civil wars|Damghan 1447]]
